r.d: Support for YAML 1.1 (YAML Ain't Markup Language) serialization using the LibYAML library.
r.n: Bugs Fixed: - #75029 Empty documents are valid (bd808) - #75213 Fix float parsing on Alpine (neclimdul) - #76309 Quote strings like "0." when emitting (bd808) - #76522 PHP 7.3 compilation fixes (dktapps, remicollet) - CRLF and whitespace fixes (petk)
